message.body: Hey! Can you tell me about going to Mt Moriah cemetery? My out of town friends want to go there
Yes!!! So you take cobbs creek to I think around 63rd street. When you are on cobbs, you will see the cemetery on your right but there's a cement barnacle on your left.
You can try to park by the baracade and go in in the left side, it's the better side.
Take the path that looks like it goes into the woods. It looks in impressive from the path but once you go in the woods, it's real weird
Yeah let me know if you get lost or anything. It's real cool
Hey! Having a small thing tonight at the house for Julian's birthday! If you guys aren't busy come by!!!
